targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    val_id as Validator,
    val_status as Status,
    val_balance / pow(10,9) as Balance
FROM
    validators_summary
WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
    epoch = ${epoch_number_var} AND
    (val_status in ['active_exiting','exited_unslashed', 'exited_slashed'] or val_status == 'withdrawal_possible' and val_balance != 0)
ORDER BY val_id, val_balance
LIMIT 1 by val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    val_id as Validator,
    val_status as Status,
    val_balance / pow(10,9) as Balance
FROM
    validators_summary
WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
    epoch = 222117 AND
    (val_status in ['active_exiting','exited_unslashed', 'exited_slashed'] or val_status == 'withdrawal_possible' and val_balance != 0)
ORDER BY val_id, val_balance
LIMIT 1 by val_id

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', current.val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0) AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_slashed, val_nos_name
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} - 6
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    sum(val_balance_withdrawn) as withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
  FROM (
    SELECT val_balance_withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - 6) AND epoch <= ${epoch_number_var}
    LIMIT 1 BY epoch, val_id
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_id
) AS withdrawals
ON
  withdrawals.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND
  withdrawals.val_id = current.val_id
HAVING (current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0)) < 0 and current.val_slashed = 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC, Validator
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', current.val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0) AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_slashed, val_nos_name
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = 222126
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = 222126 - 6
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    sum(val_balance_withdrawn) as withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
  FROM (
    SELECT val_balance_withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch > (222126 - 6) AND epoch <= 222126
    LIMIT 1 BY epoch, val_id
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_id
) AS withdrawals
ON
  withdrawals.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND
  withdrawals.val_id = current.val_id
HAVING (current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0)) < 0 and current.val_slashed = 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC, Validator
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
  is_proposer = 1 AND
  block_proposed = 0 AND
  val_stuck = 0 AND
  (epoch = ${epoch_number_var}) AND
  val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
  is_proposer = 1 AND
  block_proposed = 0 AND
  val_stuck = 0 AND
  (epoch = 222135) AND
  val_nos_name = 'Operator_1'
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
  SELECT
    val_id,
    val_nos_name,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM (
    SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
      is_sync = 1 AND 
      val_stuck = 0 AND 
      sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var}) AND
      (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${sync_epochs_var}))
    LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id  
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
)
WHERE count_fail = ${sync_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
  SELECT
    val_id,
    val_nos_name,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM (
    SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
      is_sync = 1 AND 
      val_stuck = 0 AND 
      sync_percent < (99.200439453125 - 0) AND
      (epoch <= 222137 AND epoch > (222137 - 3))
    LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id  
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id

panels.title: Bad Sync participation (${sync_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name,
      count() as count_fail
    FROM (
      SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
      FROM validators_summary
      WHERE 
        att_happened = 0 AND
        val_stuck = 0 AND
        CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
          IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
        (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var}))
      LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
    )
    GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
)
WHERE count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name,
      count() as count_fail
    FROM (
      SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
      FROM validators_summary
      WHERE 
        att_happened = 0 AND
        val_stuck = 0 AND
        CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
          IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
        (epoch <= 222140 AND epoch > (222140 - 3))
      LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
    )
    GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM (
  SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
  FROM validators_summary
  WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
    att_happened = 1 AND
    att_inc_delay > 1 AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var}))
  LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM (
  SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
  FROM validators_summary
  WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
    att_happened = 1 AND
    att_inc_delay > 1 AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    (epoch <= 222142 AND epoch > (222142 - 3))
  LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM (
  SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
  FROM validators_summary
  WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
    (att_valid_head + att_valid_target + att_valid_source = 1) AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var}))
  LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM (
  SELECT val_id, val_nos_name
  FROM validators_summary
  WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
    (att_valid_head + att_valid_target + att_valid_source = 1) AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    (epoch <= 222147 AND epoch > (222147 - 3))
  LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

targets.query:
SELECT
    if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    val_status as Status,
    val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  (val_status == 'active_slashed' OR val_status == 'exited_slashed' OR val_slashed == 1) AND
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
  epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
ORDER BY val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    val_status as Status,
    val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  (val_status == 'active_slashed' OR val_status == 'exited_slashed' OR val_slashed == 1) AND
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
  epoch = 222149
ORDER BY val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', current.val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0) AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}'))
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} - 6 AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}'))
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    sum(val_balance_withdrawn) as withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
  FROM (
    SELECT val_balance_withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - 6) AND epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}'))
    LIMIT 1 BY epoch, val_id
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_id
) AS withdrawals
ON
  withdrawals.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND
  withdrawals.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC, Validator
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', current.val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance + ifNull(withdrawals.withdrawn, 0) AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = 222150 AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1'))
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch = 222150 - 6 AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1'))
    LIMIT 1 by val_id
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    sum(val_balance_withdrawn) as withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
  FROM (
    SELECT val_balance_withdrawn, val_id, val_nos_id
    FROM validators_summary
    WHERE
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      val_status in ['active_ongoing', 'active_exiting', 'active_slashed', 'pending_initialized'] AND
      val_stuck = 0 AND
      epoch > (222150 - 6) AND epoch <= 222150 AND
      CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
        IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1'))
    LIMIT 1 BY epoch, val_id
  )
  GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_id
) AS withdrawals
ON
  withdrawals.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND
  withdrawals.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC, Validator
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
  is_proposer = 1 AND
  block_proposed = 0 AND
  (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs_range}))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM validators_summary
WHERE
  CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
    IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
  is_proposer = 1 AND
  block_proposed = 0 AND
  (epoch <= 222157 AND epoch > (222157 - 19))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
LIMIT 1 by epoch, val_id

panels.title: Number of validators with missed proposals

targets.expr: sum by (nos_name) (catalist_validators_monitoring_operator_sync_participation_avg_percent{nos_name=~'${mapped_nos_names_var}'}) AND ON(nos_name) (catalist_validators_monitoring_validator_count_with_good_sync_participation{nos_name=~'${mapped_nos_names_var}'} + catalist_validators_monitoring_validator_count_with_sync_participation_less_avg{nos_name=~'${mapped_nos_names_var}'} > 0) AND ON() changes(catalist_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[25s]) > 0

panels.description:
AVG.
`Bad` is considered when validator's sync is less than chain avg value (including `SYNC_PARTICIPATION_DISTANCE_DOWN_FROM_CHAIN_AVG`)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    if('${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    validators_summary
WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['${nos_global_index_var}'], splitByChar('|','${dvt_nos_global_indexes_var}')) AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    epoch = ${epoch_number_var} AND
    is_sync = 1 AND
    sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var})
ORDER BY sync_percent, val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    if('2;0|2;1' != '', val_nos_name, NULL) as Operator,
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    validators_summary
WHERE
    CONCAT(toString(val_nos_module_id), ';', toString(val_nos_id))
      IN arrayConcat(['1;0'], splitByChar('|','2;0|2;1')) AND
    val_stuck = 0 AND
    epoch = 222160 AND
    is_sync = 1 AND
    sync_percent < (99.0234375 - 0)
ORDER BY sync_percent, val_id
LIMIT 1 by val_id
